Introducing

Coached By Melie

Who am I?


Let's start at the beginning.

As a chiId, and up until the age of 19, I competed at a high level in Modern Pentathlon and fencing, even competing for Great Britain. Although an amazing experience, it was a lot to deal with. It broke my confidence, and I was left anxious and unhappy. It was just too much for me, and I fell depressed in 2016. I realised something had to change, and I needed to quit to be happy, so that's what I did in 2018.

However, it wasn't that easy and I was left feeling lost. I went from training 10 times a week to zero, which made my depression worse.

Until one day I had had enough, and I set off on a journey to lose weight, but not in the correct way, as I'm sure many of you can relate to. I did the typical 1000 kcals diet and hours of cardio during the week, just for me to binge on the weekends.

It was only when I joined the gym that I realised I need to fuel my body with good food. From there I started building up my weights in the gym, sculpting my body, and researching everything as I could. Which led me to complete my level 2 and 3 personal training courses in early 2021, which was the start of my Online Coaching business: Coached By Melie, alongside being a Reserach Scientist full time. I feel my calling is to help people not fall into the traps I did, I want to go above and beyond, and share what I have learn.

My journey of learning has massively changed my life in every aspect, mentally, physically, emotionally, the whole lot.

I believe living a healthy lifestyle begins with maintaining a strong and fit body, and this can then relate into every aspect of your personal being.

My Services




  • Consultation call to map out what you want from me as a Coach.
  • Coaching to help you live your best life.
  • Customised + tailored workout plans.
  • Full nutritional support- with flexibility being paramount.
  • Bi-weekly check ins for accountability, reflection and evaluation.
  • Workout tracking and video demonstrations in your very own app.
  • Consultation call to map out what you want from me as a Coach.​
  • 6 Weeks Customised + tailored workout plan​

About Coached By Melie




This coaching is the PERFECT place if you want to finally get rid of that extra fat you have, build muscle, gain strength, and change your relationship with food, along with the most important thing: BUILDING CONFIDENCE.

All without ever asking you to do a sh*tty fad diet, 3 hour workouts or or drink god awful apple cider vinegar.

Surprisingly, the number one thing people struggle with is..

Not the weightloss...

But doing it in a way that allows them to keep the weight off for good.

Most people go through life trying diet after diet.

Gaining and losing the same 5 pounds, and ending up in this yo-yo dieting cycle.

They can never really stick with anything consistently. They never really work on changing their life habits, only on how quickly they can lose this weight.

The Reality Is..

You can create life long habits and maintain a lifestyle where you can not only lose the weight, but you can keep it off for good.I won’t lie, it takes commitment.

It needs patience.

It needs change.

It needs dedication.

I know all of those things aren’t particularly sexy or I can quickly sell you on. But I am not here to sell you on anything..

I am here to get you results!

How do I get you those results?




Step 1

I’ll give you a scientific based, results driven muscle building program. Which is a personalised workout plan, individualised to you, whether that’s at home or gym.

Step 2

Full nutrition support: Calorie target and protein target. This is all about how can you sustainably fit nutrition into your life, rather than trying to fit your life around nutrition.

Step 3

The mental side of fitness is one most people don’t talk about. I will be here to guide you through what is going on in your head, because when you work on your mental fitness, the physical results not only follow, but stay FOREVER. So you will get 24/7 access to me for full support.

Step 4

With the Coached By Melie Trainerize app, you will be able to tick off your habits, track your workouts and progress.

Step 5

As your coach, I firmly believe accountability/support is the glue that keeps everything together. It is MAJORLY underestimated when it comes to how people achieve / sustain their goals. You will therefore have bi-weekly check ins. You will provide measurements, weight and progress photos every 2 weeks.

I want this to be sustainable and enjoyable, something you can carry on for life. I want you to leave with the tools to do it yourself, so you don’t have to have me as your coach forever.

All for £99 a month. ITS A NO BRAINER.
